languages.text: "Обычно я пользуюсь кровью приближенных слуг, дабы сберечь собственную. Однако в нынешней ситуации... так будет даже лучше. Кровь Навис Нобилите священна, а значит, больше подходит для ритуала единения".

traits.locale_text: "Обычно я пользуюсь кровью приближенных слуг, дабы сберечь собственную. Однако в нынешней ситуации... так будет даже лучше. Кровь Навис Нобилите священна, а значит больше подходит для ритуала единения".

languages.text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."
languages.original_text: "Обычно я пользуюсь кровью приближенных слуг, дабы сберечь собственную. Однако в нынешней ситуации... так будет даже лучше. Кровь Навис Нобилите священна, а значит, больше подходит для ритуала единения".

traits.locale_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

"It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

"It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

"It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

languages.text: “我习惯于使用侍从的鲜血，从而保存我自己的精血。不过，鉴于目前的情况……我自己的血应该会发挥更大作用。导航宗族族人的血液是拥有神圣的力量，因此更适合用来举行圣餐仪式。”
languages.original_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

traits.locale_text: “我习惯于使用侍从的鲜血，从而保存我自己的精血。不过，鉴于目前的情况……我自己的血应该会发挥更大作用。导航宗族族人的血液是拥有神圣的力量，因此更适合用来举行圣餐仪式。”

languages.text: 「従者の血を使い、自分の血を残すのがあたくしの習わしですの。ですが、現在の状況を考えると…あたくし自身の血の方がより効果的でしょう。航宙貴族の血は神聖なものであり、聖餐の儀式にはより適しているのです」
languages.original_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

traits.locale_text: 「従者の血を使い、自分の血を残すのが私の習わしです。ですが、現在の状況を考えると...私自身の血の方がより効果的でしょう。航宙貴族の血は神聖なものであり、聖餐の儀式にはより適しているのです」
「従者の血を使い、自分の血を残すのがあたくしの習わしですの。ですが、現在の状況を考えると…あたくし自身の血の方がより効果的でしょう。航宙貴族の血は神聖なものであり、聖餐の儀式にはより適しているのです」

languages.text: "Ich pflege das Blut meiner Diener zu benutzen, um mein eigenes zu schonen. Aber angesichts der aktuellen Umstände ... ist meines noch besser. Das Blut der Navis Nobilite ist heilig und daher für das Kommunionsritual geeigneter."
languages.original_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

traits.locale_text: "Ich pflege das Blut meiner Diener zu benutzen, um mein eigenes zu schonen. Aber angesichts der aktuellen Umstände ... ist meines noch besser. Das Blut der Navis Nobilite ist heilig und daher für das Kommunionsritual geeigneter."

languages.text: « D'ordinaire, j'utilise le sang de mes assistants pour préserver le mien. Toutefois, compte tenu des circonstances actuelles... mon propre sang sera plus efficace. Le sang de la Navis Nobilite est sacré et convient donc parfaitement au rituel de communion. »
languages.original_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

traits.locale_text: « D'ordinaire, j'utilise le sang de mes assistants pour préserver le mien. Toutefois, compte tenu des circonstances actuelles... mon propre sang sera plus efficace. Le sang de la Navis Nobilite est sacré et convient donc parfaitement au rituel de communion. »

languages.text: «Tengo la costumbre de usar la sangre de mis ayudantes para conservar la mía, pero, dadas las circunstancias actuales... la mía será más útil. La sangre de la Navis Nobilite es sagrada, por lo que es más apta para el ritual de comunión».
languages.original_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo la costumbre de usar la sangre de mis ayudantes para conservar la mía, pero, dadas las circunstancias actuales... la mía será más útil. La sangre de la Navis Nobilite es sagrada, por lo que es más apta para el ritual de comunión».

languages.text: "Kendi kanımı muhafaza etmek adına genelde hizmetlileriminkini kullanırım ancak içinde bulunduğumuz durum düşünüldüğünde... Benim kanım daha faydalı olacaktır. Navis Nobilite kanı kutsaldır ve iştirak ayini için daha uygundur."
languages.original_text: "It is my habit to use the blood of my attendants so as to preserve my own. However, given the current circumstances... my own will serve even better. The blood of the Navis Nobilite is sacred, and so is more suitable for the communion ritual."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi kanımı muhafaza etmek adına genelde hizmetlileriminkini kullanırım ancak içinde bulunduğumuz durum düşünüldüğünde... Benim kanım daha faydalı olacaktır. Navis Nobilite kanı kutsaldır ve iştirak ayini için daha uygundur."
